yangboz/dailyPoC.summary: The yangboz/dailyPoC repository has seen significant recent activity, with multiple push events occurring on January 9, 2025. These updates include revisions to the README.md file, as well as the addition of new files, specifically index.html for the frontend and app.py for the backend. These changes suggest ongoing development and refinement of the project.

profile_summary: I'm a seasoned developer with a strong foundation in C++, C, and Go, constantly learning and expanding my skills through hands-on experience. With a network of 175 followers and 736 public repositories, I'm passionate about collaborating on cutting-edge open source projects, currently focusing on AI and seeking like-minded individuals to share knowledge and code. You can reach me at youngwelle@gmail.com or smartkit@msn.com to explore potential collaborations and learn from each other.
